content.description: Sit start with a pair of edges. From there, climb up through edges to reach an easy mantel.
content.protection: A pad or two. The landing is good.
content.location: It climbs the south face of Crispr.

content.description: Sit start matched on an edge. From there, climb through through a series of good edges to reach an easy mantel.
content.protection: At least a pad or two. There is a rock directly behind the problem.
content.location: It climbs the east face of Crispr.

content.description:
Start with a good left jug, and a bit lower to the right there is a crimp. Heel low left beneath your left hand on a good ledge, and flag hard with right foot out left underneath the heel.

Move to the dish on the right. Use small crimps to set yourself up to move your heel up to where your left hand started.

Rock onto your heel, and reach for a half pad crimp. Bump your left hand to a better crimp and match. From here, you can reach the giant edge, then a choose your own adventure mantel is good up top.
content.protection: Pads. The landing is pretty good.
content.location:
It is to the left of

Id Drive

.
